dmca.title: APCM DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
APCM- ASSOCIAÇÃO ANTIPIRATARIA CINEMA E MÚSICA

RUA TEODORO SAMPAIO, 1765, 7ºANDAR - SÃO PAULO - SP - BRAZIL

INTERNET ANTI-PIRACY TEAM

(+55) 11 - [redacted]

[redacted]apcm.org.br <mailto:[redacted]apcm.org.br>  

 

 

ATTN: BLOGGER LEGAL SUPPORT - DMCA COMPLAINTS

COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

 

We hereby declare that APCM - Associação Antipirataria de Cinema e Musica (Brazillian Anti Piracy Music and Cinema Association)- is the authorized representative of UNIVERSAL MUSIC DO BRASIL LTDA.; WARNER MUSIC BRASIL LTDA.; SONY - BMG BRASIL LTDA.; SIGLA - SISTEMA GLOBO DE GRAVAÇÕES AUDIO VISUAIS LTDA; EMI MUSIC LTDA.;COLUMBIA PICTURES INDUSTRIES INC.; DISNEY ENTERPRISES INC.; METRO-GOLDWYN-MAYER STUDIOS INC.; PARAMOUNT PICTURES CORPORATION; TWENTIETH CENTURY FOX FILM CORPORATION; UNIVERSAL CITY STUDIOS INC.; WARNER BROS.; UNITED ARTISTS PICTURES INC.; UNITED ARTISTS CORPORATION; UBV - UNIÃO BRASILEIRA DE VÍDEO E ASSOCIADAS, representing IFPI - International Federation of the Phonographic Industry and MPA - Motion Picture Association.

 

 

1. The referred to copyrighted works are, respectively, being illegally made available for download through the permalinks listed in the column "Permalink" in the attached pages. 

 

2. It is important to mention that the Blog's sole purpose is to illegally make copyright-protected works available for download, without the copyright owner's authorization. Despite the fact that each infringing post is identified through its permalink, we would like to request that the entire blogs be taken down.

 

3. We may be contacted through the numbers, address and e-mail address indicated at the top of this page.

 

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

 

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

 

 

 

[redacted]

[redacted]@apcm.org.br <mailto:[redacted]@apcm.org.br> 

Phone: 55 11 3894 0250  

Internet Anti-Piracy Manager

APCM- Associação Antipirataria Cinema e Música
